Page.Name: DrumsUI_ST
Page.OnShow: AutoShow.Checked=Visible COND=(Width < 145) ShowStackCount2.visible=COND HideStackCount2.visible='!'COND Refresh.press=true
Page.OnSize: COND=(Width < 145) ShowStackCount2.visible=COND HideStackCount2.visible='!'COND Composite.1.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.2.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.3.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.4.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.5.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.6.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.7.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.8.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.9.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.10.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.11.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.12.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.13.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.14.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.15.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.16.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.17.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.18.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.19.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.20.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.21.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.22.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.23.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.24.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.25.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.26.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.27.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.28.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.29.Amount2.visible=COND Composite.30.Amount2.visible=COND

Text.Name: AutoLoad
Text.OnTextChanged: show_window Custom.DrumsUI_ST.AutoLoad

Text.Name: PlayerName
Text.OnTextChanged: Parent.DoCommand.onshow=('hide_window Custom.DrumsUI_ST.AutoLoad') COND1=(Text=='NoName') COND2=(Text==sName) COND3=(Text=='') COND=(COND1 || COND2 || COND3) Parent.DoCommand.visible=(COND ? false : true) sName=Text

Button.Name: Load
Button.OnShow: show_window Custom.DrumsUI_ST show_window Custom.DrumsUI_ST_Auto show_window Custom.DrumsUI_ST_Settings Parent.LoadCheck.OnTextChanged=Parent.LoadCheck.codeToCopy Visible=false

Text.codeToCopy:
COND1=(Parent.Parent.Name == '_HUD') COND2=(Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_ST_Settings.Name == 'DrumsUI_ST_Settings') COND=(COND1 && COND2) Parent.Init.visible=COND ? true : false Visible=COND ? false : true
COND=(Parent.Parent.Name == 'Custom') Visible=COND ? false : true
Text.Name: LoadCheck

Button.Name: Init
Button.OnShow:
Parent.LoadAllCmdText.press=true
COND=(Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_ST_Auto.Width == 1) Parent.DoHide.visible=COND ? true : false
Visible=false

Button.Name: SetupAllCmdText
Button.OnPress:
sNAME=Parent.PlayerName.Text
Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('Parent.SetupCmdText.bCheckCmdText=Parent.Parent.Parent.Custom.DrumsUI_ST_Settings.' ## sNAME ## '.' ## sCMD ## '.Show') Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('Parent.SetupCmdText.sUserCmdText=Parent.Parent.Parent.Custom.DrumsUI_ST_Settings.' ## sNAME ## '.' ## sCMD ## '.Description') Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('Parent.SetupCmdText.sDefaultCmdText=Parent.UserSettings.' ## sCMD ## '.defCmdText') Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.SetupCmdText.press=true
Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('Parent.UserSettings.' ## sCMD ## '.cmdText=(Parent.SetupCmdText.sCOND)') Parent.DoCommand.press=true

Page.Name: ST_1
Page.OnDisable: OnEnable=('"Parent.Parent.Slots.' ## sNewName ## '.Name"=' ## Name) Enabled=true Visible=true Parent.Parent.Refresh.press=true
Page.OnShow:
Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('sStripQuotes="' ## cmdText ## '"' ) Parent.DoCommand.press=true bStrip=(Parent.DoCommand.sStripQuotes == cmdText) Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('sStripQuotes2=' ## cmdText) Parent.DoCommand.visible=(bStrip ? false : true)
cmdText=(bStrip ? Parent.DoCommand.sStripQuotes : Parent.DoCommand.sStripQuotes2)
bCheck=(cmdText == defCmdText) sNewName=(bCheck ? Name : cmdText) OnHide=('Parent.Parent.Slots.' ## Name ## '.Name=sNewName') Visible=false

Text.Name: StackCount
Text.OnTextChanged: sCond=(Text > 0) Visible=sCond Parent.StackCount2.Text=Text

Text.Name: Name
Text.OnTextChanged: Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('sStripQuotes="' ## Text ## '"') Parent.DoCommand.press=true bStrip=(Parent.DoCommand.sStripQuotes == Text) Parent.DoCommand.onpress=('sStripQuotes2=' ## Text) Parent.DoCommand.visible=(bStrip ? false : true) sSlot=(bStrip?
